description:
Momo Hinamori is the vice captain of squad five. She is a kind, sweet and almost na√Øve young girl who desires above all else to protect those she cares for. Hinamori has a good relationship with her captain, http://anidb.net/ch3746 [Aizen], and is a childhood friend of http://anidb.net/ch8354 [Hitsugaya Toushirou]. Though she appears weak, Hinamori is actually quite strong; she is incredibly talented when it comes to kidou and she wields the flame-type zanpakutou, http://anidb.net/ch10806 [Tobiume].
Source: Anime-Planet
name: Hinamori Momo
